name: Plantiful Harvest
description:
Plantiful Harvest

The Plantiful Harvest garden is now open and your customers are requesting orders to be filled!

Make matches between 9 different cards to plant, grow then harvest plants to fill orders. New plants cards are drawn each match made. New game issues new orders.

Is your memory as sharp as the shade shovel to make your customers happy?

Single player card game for PC
Supports most aspect ratio. base 1920x1080
No audio

Thank you for playing!

Constructive feedback is appreciated.

More to come!? Goal $250

Additional game mode, difficulty options, plant cards...
